thread.title: 26 Things Absolutely Every Girl Who Grew Up Playing With Barbies Did
thread.title_full: 26 Things Absolutely Every Girl Who Grew Up Playing With Barbies Did

author: Crystal Ro, Brian Galindo
title: 26 Things Absolutely Every Girl Who Grew Up Playing With Barbies Did
text:
View this image ›
Via etsy.com ID: 10339065 2. Giving Barbie a ~hot new~ makeover with crayons or, worse yet, markers. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339387 3. Losing ONE shoe and having to play with your doll and pretend it wasn’t missing it… View this image ›
Via flyingpurplemonkfish.blogspot.com ID: 10339110 4. …that is until you *painfully* stepped on the missing shoe days later. View this image ›
Crystal Ro for BuzzFeed ID: 10339920 5. Hyperextending Barbie’s knee to see just how far it would go back… View this image ›
Brian Galindo for BuzzFeed ID: 10339216 6. …and also attempting to get Barbie to do a side split. View this image ›
Brian Galindo for BuzzFeed ID: 10339219 7. Attempting to give Barbie a “cool new look” by cutting her hair… View this image ›
Via oliverfinley.com ID: 10340277 8. …or pulling it out entirely until you could see her scalp, just ‘cause. View this image ›
Via savanahprose.wordpress.com ID: 10339235 9. Shaving Barbie’s legs (like a grownup would)…which then led to you peeling of her skin. View this image ›
Via instagram.com ID: 10339280 10. Making Barbie move on from Ken as soon as you got a new boy doll (WHY HELLO, ALADDIN!). View this image ›
Via etsy.com ID: 10339318 11. Burning/melting parts of Barbie’s body, usually her face. Honestly you were just curious. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339336 12. Playing with them so much in the tub that they developed a weird, mildewy smell and then having to make them permanent bathtub toys — since they smelled too gross to put back in your toy box. View this image ›
Via momisnutz.blogspot.com ID: 10339353 13. Making Barbie “pregnant” by stuffing cotton balls or wadded up toilet paper under her dress. View this image ›
Via mooshinindy.com ID: 10339363 14. Cutting up your Barbie’s clothes to make it ~sexier~… View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339425 15. …or just making her new outfits altogether with things like aluminum foil or toilet paper. View this image ›
ID: 10339455 16. Loading up your Barbies in her car and pushing them off the stairs, just because. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339634 17. Giving your Barbies super trashy “storylines” worthy of a soap opera (aka lots of fighting and backstabbing). View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339670 18. Getting a new Barbie and immediately giving her a more glamorous/prettier name. View this image ›
Crystal Ro for BuzzFeed/ Mattel ID: 10339959 19. And then making your older, “ugly” Barbie the “evil” Barbie. View this image ›
Via ecrater.com ID: 10339692 20. Constantly undressing your Barbies — it was basically a nudist colony. View this image ›
Via instagram.com ID: 10340424 21. Secretly opening the box and playing with your oh-so-pretty Collector’s Barbie you weren’t supposed to open or play with. View this image ›
Via eBay ID: 10339818 22. Getting pissed whenever one of your relatives gave you a knock-off Barbie. View this image ›
Via thismapisright.wordpress.com ID: 10339824 23. Fighting with your BFF or neighbor over which outfit your Barbie got to wear. View this image ›
Via vansdolltreasures.blogspot.com ID: 10339731 24. Forcing your younger sibling or cousin to play all the supporting roles (like Ken, Skipper and knock-off Barbie), while you ONLY played Barbie. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339746 25. Having a fit at the toy store because your parents refused to buy you an expensive accessory (looking at you, Barbie Dream House). View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10339881 26. Making your Barbies have sex, like…a lot. And by sex we mean they just laid there kissing each other ‘cause that’s how you made babies (right?). View this image ›
Sam Stryker for BuzzFeed ID: 10338909
